Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP when I started thinking about my first time on the Forums. I was a long time Lurker, and I had finally had the courage to post.

My first post

Today I crashed 17 planes' date=' landed on the [u']mum once, and set a satellite around Duna.

Normal Day:cool:

Then, my first thread was this:

Best Achievements

My question is, What was your first Thread?

Edited March 29, 2015 by Teoman2

My first thread asked how often KSP went on sale.

I was cheap as heck... just kidding, I had $24 in my Steam Wallet and didn't want to buy any more to get to KSP's $27

But I was still cheap.

My first thread was 'Anybody care for some asparagus?'

I still don't start very many threads, but I post a lot.

Happy landings!
I had a question about the maximum machine specs, like at what point will upgrading your pc not help because of unity limitations.
I signed up on these forums just so I could ask a question on how to install mods, more specifically KSP Interstellar. Now look at me!

My first thread was an introduction. It seems like I haven't changed too much

Except my username of course, but Maximus97 is soooo much better.

None of the above. My first post/thread was to report an error and make a suggestion in the "Suggestions and Development Discussion" forum. Since the post included some "Sciency Stuff", I've selected the second option in your poll.

Edited March 30, 2015 by OhioBob
This was my first post and first thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112859-HOPPER-%28High-occupancy-para-planetary-exploration-rover%29

My first one was when I saw a ejector seat in ksp and tried to re make it XD I was such a noob dint even know how to post a screen shot of it so I used the one I'd coppyed to make mine and posted that
my first thread was used to advertise a WIP mod. Now it turned into a journal.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45127-Mod-Stock-Craft-ShowRoom-by-WinkAllKerb

Might be that ; )

Mine was (no surprise) me sharing my first KSP video with everyone.

I can't believe that was so long ago now. Wow.

(Very) Long time lurker here.

(more than 2 years, Whoo!)

My first thread was:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/23092-KSA-Intrepid-0-17-MODS-STOCK

Long time ago...

Mine was a question over if it was possible to Save file edit a ship in space back into the VAB.

My first post (on this post Great Forum Glitch account) was

Shouldn't that be a kraken, rather than a beast?
Edited March 30, 2015 by Tw1

Mine was (no surprise) me sharing my first KSP video with everyone.

I can't believe that was so long ago now. Wow.

Dude! I didn't know that was your first vid!

I had just installed NovaPunch for aesthetics and got a little confused about the fairings.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/11727-NovaPunch-I-don-t-have-any-2-metre-fairing-plates
A game feature idea.
According to the search my first one was a HelloWorld-Thread

I remember that my first thread reply was a showcase of a single-launch space station in "Showoff your Rep-worthy crafts".

Aahh.. the days when I didn't have an avatar.

Mine was in the science labs asking about black holes and the speed of light, so i don't know what category of the poll that goes in. To be honest, I spend way more time in the science labs and space lounge than talking about ksp ;-;
